One of the best games ive ever played, now ill just pray for a third installment. or at  least a VR one
Spät entdeckt und überrascht gewesen, welchen Spaß man da haben kann - egal ob alleine oder zu zweit. Tolles Dingen :)
muito top, melhor puzzle da steam
So comprei pra zerar mas recomendo pra quem ta com um pc fraco e quer jogar um jogo off line bom

Ah, Portal 2. This game is the epitome of a puzzle / RPG. Incredible level design, perfect story integration, and overall a great time. It can get to be a bit hard, but who doesnt love some challenge? If you like video games, heck even if you dont, you would love this game to its fullest. Its better with friends, but almost all games are. This game is why I absolutely adore Valve.

Leve e bonito
A história é muito boa

E uma ótima variedade de mapas customs na oficina
Pasan los años, sigo jugandolo y aun a día de hoy no me aburro. Juego super entretenido y con una historia super divertida. Mi reino por un portal 3 con las mismas caracteristicas!.

Eu resumo esse jogo em uma palavra 

INCRIVEL

Um jogo simples de puzzle, que todos amam, com uma ótima trilha sonora faz desse jogo um ótimo jogo até hoje, com certeza um dos melhores jogos de puzzle de todos os tempos. :D
A really fun game and a amazing story! Super fun to play with a friend! 10/10

Uno de los mejores juegos que he jugado y que no puede faltar en la biblioteca de nadie. Si tienes un amigo, mucho mejor ya que la diversion nunca termina.
An outstanding game, in an amazing series. 9/10
A great sequel with a more fleshed out story and wonderful voice acting.

I'm a sucker for a good puzzle game, and this game did not disappoint. I've replayed this game a few times over the last three years and it's just as good each playthrough. Co-op is pretty fun too if you have some friends to play with.
Best Valve Game Ever. No Questions Asked.
This game is so cute, an amazing experience with friends and there is always something to think about before acting!
Classic Valve. Loads of fun. Highly recommended.
